report_title: KJET Kitui County Application Ranking and Evaluation

ranked_applicants.applicant_name: Mwingi Sand Harvesting Co-operative Society Limited

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative registered >3 yrs (CS/11254) with functioning governance (Score 5).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Projected KES 20M+ Net Surplus; KES 100k 2024 Turnover, positive trend (Score 4).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Monopoly (sole sand cooperative); clear B2B strategy (Affordable Housing Project) (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem/solution (sand value-add/transport); quantified targets (6 lorries, 400 jobs); detailed plan (Score 5).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Construction-sand/gravel); fills critical extraction, value-add, and logistics node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High women participation (40% leadership, 33% membership); 2+ green practices (NEMA EIAs, tree planting, riverbank rehab) (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan (kiln acquisition); targets and timelines present (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Forestry); fills critical processing/value addition node (timber treatment) (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Moderate inclusion (40% youth); some intent on sustainability (replanting, waste reduction) (Score 3).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Plan to acquire stone crusher/cabro block machine; clear objective; targets present (Score 4).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Moderate inclusion (40% youth); some green practices (tree planting, gas use) (Score 3).
